description.english: You have completed the Tutorial.
description.french: Vous avez terminé le didacticiel.
description.italian: Hai completato il tutorial.
description.spanish: Has terminado el tutorial.
description.schinese: 你已经完成了教程。
description.japanese: チュートリアルをクリアした
description.brazilian: Você concluiu o tutorial.

description.english: You are "reunited" with your daughter.
description.german: Du bist wieder mit deiner Tochter „vereint“.
description.french: Vous avez "retrouvé" votre fille.
description.italian: Ti sei "ricongiunto" con tua figlia.
description.spanish: Te has "reconciliado" con tu hija.
description.schinese: 你已和自己的女儿“团聚”
description.japanese: 娘と再会した
description.brazilian: Você "reencontrou" a sua filha.

description.english: You have defeated Jack in Prokriana.
description.german: Du hast Jack in Prokriana besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu Jack à Prokriana.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Jack a Prokriana.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Jack en Prokriana.
description.schinese: 你已在 Prokriana 中击败了杰克。
description.russian: Вы одержали верх над Джеком в Прокриане.
description.japanese: プロクリアナでジャックを倒した
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o Jack em Prokriana.

description.english: You "escaped" the Orbital Station.
description.french: Vous vous êtes "enfui" de la station orbitale.
description.italian: Sei "fuggito" dalla stazione orbitale.
description.spanish: Has "escapado" de la estación en órbita.
description.schinese: 你“逃离”了轨道站。
description.japanese: 軌道ステーションから「脱出」した
description.polish: Udało ci się „uciec” z bazy orbitalnej.
description.brazilian: Você "escapou" da estação orbital.

displayName.japanese: ヨッドマスプレゼント

description.english: You have obtained Oru's Gun.
description.french: Vous avez obtenu l'arme d'Oru.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto il cannone di Oru.
description.spanish: Has obtenido el arma de Oru.
description.schinese: 你已获得了奥卢枪。
description.japanese: オルーの銃を入手した
description.brazilian: Você obteve a Arma de Oru.

description.english: You have saved Adelpha.
description.french: Vous avez sauvé Adelpha.
description.italian: Hai salvato Adelpha.
description.spanish: Has salvado Adelpha.
description.schinese: 你拯救了 Adelpha。
description.japanese: アデルファを救った
description.brazilian: Você salvou Adelpha.

description.english: You have destroyed a Drill.
description.french: Vous avez détruit un engin de forage.
description.italian: Hai distrutto una trivella.
description.spanish: Has destruido un taladro.
description.schinese: 你摧毁了 1 台钻机。
description.japanese: ドリルを1つ破壊した
description.brazilian: Você destruiu uma broca.

description.english: You have destroyed 3 Drills.
description.french: Vous avez détruit 3 engins de forage.
description.italian: Hai distrutto 3 trivelle.
description.spanish: Has destruido tres taladros.
description.schinese: 你摧毁了 3 台钻机。
description.japanese: ドリルを3つ破壊した
description.brazilian: Você destruiu 3 brocas.

displayName.japanese: わからず屋の・ふざけた・アホども

description.english: You have destroyed 500 droids.
description.french: Vous avez neutralisé 500 robots.
description.italian: Hai ucciso 500 robot.
description.spanish: Has matado a 500 robots.
description.schinese: 你摧毁了 500 台机器人。
description.japanese: ロボットを500体倒した
description.brazilian: Você abateu 500 robôs.

description.english: You have killed 200 creatures.
description.french: Vous avez éliminé 200 créatures.
description.italian: Hai ucciso 200 creature.
description.spanish: Has matado a 200 criaturas.
description.schinese: 你消灭了 200 头生物。
description.japanese: 生物を200体倒した
description.brazilian: Você matou 200 criaturas.

displayName.english: What the hell do you use it for? My cannon
displayName.german: Wofür brauchst du die? Für meine Kanone.
displayName.french: Rien de nouveau sous le soleil...
displayName.italian: Per cosa diavolo si usa? Il mio cannone.
displayName.koreana: 이걸 어디에 쓰냐고? 내 대포에 쓰지
displayName.schinese: 你到底要用它做什么？那是我的大炮
displayName.russian: Зачем он тебе был нужен? Для моей пушки
displayName.japanese: 一体何に使うんだ？ 大砲だよ
displayName.polish: Na cholerę co ci to? Do armaty
displayName.brazilian: Pra que diabos você usa isso? Meu canhão

description.english: You have defeated the Garondar.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le garondar.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il Garondar.
description.spanish: Has vencido a los garondars.
description.schinese: 你击败了 Garondar。
description.japanese: ガロンダーを倒した
description.brazilian: Você derrotou a Garondar.

description.english: You have defeated an Officer.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu un officier.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto un ufficiale.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a un oficial.
description.schinese: 你击败了一名军官。
description.japanese: 士官を倒した
description.brazilian: Você derrotou um oficial.

displayName.english: This is my Rifle, this is my Gun
displayName.german: Dies ist mein Stolz und das mein Gewehr
displayName.french: Mon fusil, c'est mon vrai copain
displayName.italian: Il mio fucile è il mio migliore amico
displayName.spanish: Aquí mi fusil, aquí mi pistola
displayName.schinese: 这是我的步枪，我的命根
displayName.russian: Это винтовка, а это мой ствол
displayName.polish: To mój karabin, a to mój gnat
displayName.brazilian: Este é meu fuzil, esta é minha arma

description.english: You have obtained the Rifle.
description.french: Vous avez obtenu le fusil.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto il fucile.
description.spanish: Has conseguido el fusil.
description.schinese: 你已获得了步枪。
description.japanese: ライフルを入手した
description.brazilian: Você conseguiu o fuzil.

displayName.french: Dites bonjour à mon petit ami
displayName.schinese: 朝我的小朋友说声“你好”
displayName.japanese: 俺のダチ公に挨拶しろ
displayName.polish: Przywitaj się z moim małym przyjacielem

description.english: You have obtained all the items in the game.

displayName.german: Bis zur Unendlichkeit, und noch viel weiter!

displayName.english: How long were you alone with that dog?
displayName.german: Wie lange waren Sie mit dem Hund allein?
displayName.french: Et combien de temps es-tu resté seul avec lui ?
displayName.italian: Quanto tempo sei stato solo con quel cane?
displayName.spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo estuviste solo con el perro?
displayName.schinese: 你和那条狗独处多久了？
displayName.russian: И давно ты был один с этой псиной?
displayName.japanese: いつからその犬と2人きりだった？
displayName.polish: Ile czasu spędziłeś z tym psem sam na sam?
displayName.arabic: منذ متى وأنت وحدك مع ذلك الكلب؟
displayName.brazilian: Por quanto tempo você ficou sozinho com aquele cachorro?

description.english: You have cleared one Gork Eruption.
description.french: Vous avez nettoyé une éruption de gork.
description.italian: Hai completato un'eruzione di gork.

description.schinese: 你已清理一处 Gork 喷发。
description.japanese: ゴークの噴火を1つクリアした
description.brazilian: Você concluiu uma Erupção de Gorks.

displayName.german: Willkommen in der Sesamstraße, Kinder. Das heutige Wort ist Buße.
displayName.italian: Benvenuti a Sesame Street, bambini. La parola di oggi è "espiazione"
displayName.spanish: Bienvenidos a Barrio Sésamo, niños. Hoy aprenderemos la palabra "expiación"
displayName.schinese: 欢迎来到芝麻街，孩子们。今天我们要学的词是“赎罪”
displayName.japanese: セサミストリートにようこそ、みんな。今日の言葉は罪滅ぼしだよ
displayName.polish: Witajcie na Ulicy Sezamkowej! Dziś poznamy słowo „skrucha”
displayName.arabic: مرحبًا بكم في شارع سمسم يا أطفال. كلمة اليوم هي تكفير.
displayName.brazilian: Bem-vindas à Vila Sésamo, crianças. A palavra de hoje é "penitência"

displayName.english: You want fear? I'm the fear.

displayName.french: Vous voulez la terreur ? Je suis la terreur
displayName.italian: Volete la paura? Io sono la paura
displayName.schinese: 你说恐惧？而我就是恐惧
displayName.japanese: 恐怖が欲しいか？ 俺こそが恐怖だ

description.french: Vous avez terminé les 30 avant-postes.
description.italian: Hai completato tutti e 30 gli avamposti.
description.spanish: Has completado los 30 puestos.
description.schinese: 你已通关了全部 30 座哨站。
description.japanese: 前哨基地を30個すべてクリアした
description.brazilian: Você concluiu os 30 postos avançados.

displayName.english: You got the wrong guy. I’m the Dude, man
displayName.german: Ihr habt den Falschen. Ich bin der Dude, Mann!
displayName.french: Vous devez vous gourer. On m'appelle le Duc, mec
displayName.italian: Avete sbagliato persona, io sono Drugo
displayName.spanish: Te has equivocado de tío. Yo soy El Nota
displayName.schinese: 你找错人了。我才是你要找的人，哥们
displayName.russian: Вы не того взяли. Я – Чувак, чувак
displayName.japanese: 人違いだ。俺はデュードだ
displayName.polish: Złapaliście niewłaściwego faceta – to ja, Koleś
displayName.arabic: لديك الشخص الخطأ. أنا المنشود يا رجل.
displayName.brazilian: Você mexeu com a pessoa errada. Eu sou O CARA

description.english: You have neutralized one Base.
description.french: Vous avez détruit une base.
description.italian: Hai distrutto una base.
description.spanish: Has destruido una base.
description.schinese: 你摧毁了 1 座基地。
description.japanese: 基地を1つ破壊した
description.brazilian: Você destruiu uma base.

description.english: You have neutralized all 14 Bases.
description.french: Vous avez détruit les 14 bases.
description.italian: Hai distrutto tutte e 14 le basi.
description.spanish: Has destruido las 14 bases.
description.schinese: 你摧毁了全部 14 座基地。
description.japanese: 基地を14個すべて破壊した
description.brazilian: Você destruiu as 14 bases.

displayName.english: Where we're going, we don't need roads!
displayName.german: Straßen? Wo wir hinfahren, brauchen wir keine Straßen!
displayName.french: Là où on va, on n'a pas besoin de route
displayName.italian: Strade? Dove andiamo noi non servono strade!
displayName.koreana: 길? 우리가 가는 곳엔 길이 필요 없단다!
displayName.schinese: 路？我们要去的地方，不需要路！
displayName.japanese: 道？ 我々が向かう先に道なんて必要ない
displayName.polish: Drogi? Tam, dokąd się udamy, nie będą nam potrzebne!
displayName.arabic: الطرق؟ إلى أين سنذهب، لسنا بحاجة إلى الطرق!
displayName.brazilian: Estradas? Para onde estamos indo, não precisamos de estradas!

description.english: You have opened one Orym Chest.
description.french: Vous avez ouvert un coffre des pistes d'Orym.
description.italian: Hai aperto uno scrigno dei sentieri di Orym.
description.spanish: Has abierto un cofre del Camino de Orym.
description.schinese: 你打开了 1 个奥利姆路径宝箱。
description.japanese: オリムのチェストを1つ開けた
description.brazilian: Você abriu um baú da Trilha de Orym.

description.english: You have opened 50 Orym Chests.
description.french: Vous avez ouvert les 50 coffres des pistes d'Orym.
description.italian: Hai aperto 50 scrigni dei sentieri di Orym.
description.spanish: Has abierto 50 cofres del Camino de Orym.
description.schinese: 你打开了 50 个奥利姆路径宝箱。
description.japanese: オリムのチェストを50個開けた
description.polish: Otwarto każdą z 50 skrzyń szlaku Oryma.
description.brazilian: Você abriu 50 baús da Trilha de Orym.

description.english: You have completed all 4 Temples.
description.french: Vous avez terminé les 4 temples.
description.italian: Hai completato tutti e 4 i templi.
description.spanish: Has completado los 4 templos.
description.schinese: 你已通关了全部 4 座神庙。
description.japanese: 神殿を4つすべてクリアした
description.brazilian: Você concluiu os 4 templos.

displayName.english: If I'm not back in five minutes, wait longer
displayName.german: Falls ich in 5 Minuten nicht zurück sein sollte, warten Sie einfach ein bisschen länger
displayName.french: Si jamais, je ne suis pas de retour dans 5 minutes, attendez plus longtemps
displayName.italian: Se non torno entro cinque minuti, aspettate un po' di più
displayName.koreana: 5분 안에 안 될 것 같으니 기다려줘
displayName.spanish: Si no he vuelto en cinco minutos, esperen un poco más
displayName.schinese: 如果我五分钟后还没回来，就再等一会儿
displayName.russian: Не вернусь через пять минут – подожди еще
displayName.japanese: 5分で戻らなかったらもっと待っててくれ
displayName.polish: Jeśli nie wrócę w ciągu pięciu minut, czekajcie dalej
displayName.arabic: إذا لم أعد خلال خمس دقائق، فانتظر لفترة أطول
displayName.brazilian: Se eu não voltar em cinco minutos, espere mais um pouco

description.english: You have completed an Essence Shrine.
description.french: Vous avez terminé un Sanctuaire aux Essences.
description.italian: Hai completato un santuario dell'essenza.
description.spanish: Has completado un santuario de esencia.
description.schinese: 你已通关了 1 座本灵神龛。
description.japanese: 元素の神殿を1つクリアした
description.brazilian: Você concluiu um Templo de Essências.

description.english: You have completed all 20 Essence Shrines.
description.french: Vous avez terminé les 20 Sanctuaires aux Essences.
description.italian: Hai completato tutti e 20 i santuari dell'essenza.
description.spanish: Has completado los 20 santuarios de esencia.
description.schinese: 你已通关了全部 20 座本灵神龛。
description.japanese: 元素の神殿を20個すべてクリアした
description.brazilian: Você concluiu os 20 Templos de Essências.

displayName.schinese: 吝啬鬼 Mc 斯莱德
displayName.japanese: スクルージ・マクスレイド

description.english: You earned 3000 Zorkins.
description.french: Vous avez accumulé 3 000 zorkins.
description.italian: Hai accumulato 3.000 Zorkin.
description.spanish: Has acumulado 3000 zorkins.
description.schinese: 你花掉了 3000 枚 Zorkin。
description.japanese: 3000ゾルキン貯めた
description.brazilian: Você acumulou 3.000 Zorkins.

displayName.japanese: これ何ていうんだっけ？ オーバーなんとか？

description.english: You overheated both weapons within 3 seconds.
description.german: Du hast beide Waffen in 3 Sekunden vollständig überhitzt.
description.french: Vous avez fait surchauffer complètement les deux armes en 3 secondes.
description.italian: Hai surriscaldato completamente entrambe le armi in 3 secondi.
description.koreana: 양손에 든 무기를 3초 안에 완전히 과열시켰습니다.
description.spanish: Has sobrecalentado por completo ambas armas en 3 s.
description.schinese: 你在 3 秒内完全过热了两把武器。
description.russian: Вы довели оба оружия до перегрева за 3 секунды.
description.japanese: 3秒間で両方の武器を完全にオーバーヒートさせた
description.polish: Doprowadzono do całkowitego przegrzania obu broni w ciągu 3 sekund.
description.arabic: بلغت الحرارة المفرطة للسلاحين بالكامل في 3 ثوان.
description.brazilian: Você superaqueceu as duas armas em 3 segundos.

description.english: You have glided for 3 minutes straight without hitting the ground.
description.german: Du bist 3 Minuten geradeaus geflogen, ohne den Boden zu treffen.
description.french: Vous avez volé pendant 3 minutes en ligne droite sans toucher le sol.
description.italian: Hai volato per 3 minuti di fila senza toccare terra.
description.koreana: 3분 동안 지상에 충돌하지 않고 직선으로 비행했습니다.
description.spanish: Has volado tres minutos seguidos sin tocar el suelo.
description.schinese: 你脚不落地飞行了 3 分钟之久。
description.russian: Вы пролетели 3 минуты, не касаясь земли.
description.japanese: 3分間着地せずに飛び続けた
description.polish: Utrzymano się w powietrzu przez 3 minuty bez upadku na ziemię.
description.arabic: حلقت لمدة 3 دقائق متصلة دون الاصطدام بالأرض.
description.brazilian: Você voou por 3 minutos seguidos sem atingir o chão.

description.english: You have been healed by a Shamaz while close to death.
description.german: Du bist von einem Shamaz geheilt worden, als du fast tot warst.
description.french: Vous avez été soigné par un Shamaz alors que vous étiez mourant.
description.italian: Hai ricevuto cure da uno Shamaz quando eri quasi morto.
description.spanish: Has recibido la curación de un shamaz cuando estabas a punto de morir.
description.schinese: 你在濒死时获得了一名 Shamaz 的治疗。
description.russian: Вы получили исцеление от шамаза на грани смерти.
description.japanese: 瀕死状態でシャマズの治療を受けた
description.polish: Na skraju śmierci otrzymano leczenie od szamaza.
description.arabic: تلقيت علاجًا من شاماز وأنت على حافة الموت.
description.brazilian: Você recebeu a cura de um Shamaz quando estava quase sem vida.

description.english: You have been remembering old memories.
description.german: Du hast in alten Erinnerungen geschwelgt.
description.french: Vous vous êtes remémoré de vieux souvenirs.
description.italian: Ti sono tornati alla mente dei vecchi ricordi.
description.spanish: Has revivido viejos recuerdos.
description.schinese: 你回忆起了过往。
description.japanese: 昔の記憶を思い出した
description.brazilian: Você está se lembrando de coisas antigas.

displayName.japanese: 説明してる時間はない

description.english: You have picked a plant while gliding in the air.
description.german: Du hast eine Pflanze im Gleitflug erwischt.
description.french: Vous avez attrapé une plante alors que vous planiez dans les airs.
description.italian: Hai raccolto una pianta mentre planavi.
description.spanish: Has atrapado una planta mientras planeabas por el aire.
description.schinese: 你在空中滑翔时抓住了一株植物。
description.russian: Вы поймали растение, паря в воздухе.
description.japanese: 滑空しながら植物を手に入れた
description.arabic: أخذت نباتًا خلال التحليق في الهواء.
description.brazilian: Você pegou uma planta enquanto estava deslizando no ar.

description.english: You have neutralized a Drone with a basic melee attack.
description.german: Du hast eine Drohne mit einem Basis-Nahkampfangriff erledigt.
description.french: Vous avez neutralisé un drone à l'aide d'une attaque de mêlée de base.
description.italian: Hai ucciso un drone con un attacco corpo a corpo di base.
description.spanish: Has acabado con un dron de un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo básico.
description.schinese: 你用一记基础近战攻击摧毁了一台无人机。
description.russian: Вы прикончили дрона простой атакой ближнего боя.
description.japanese: 基本近接攻撃でドローンを倒した
description.arabic: قتلت طائرة مسيرة بهجوم اشتباك بسيط.
description.brazilian: Você abateu um drone com um ataque corpo a corpo básico.

description.english: You have obtained all the trophies of Outcast - A New Beginning.
description.german: Du hast alle anderen Erfolge von Outcast - A New Beginning erhalten.
description.french: Vous avez obtenu tous les succès d'Outcast - A New Beginning.
description.italian: Hai sbloccato tutti gli altri obiettivi di Outcast - A New Beginning.
description.koreana: Outcast - A New Beginning 도전과제를 모두 획득했습니다.
description.spanish: Has obtenido todos los demás logros de Outcast - A New Beginning.
description.schinese: 你已获得了《Outcast - A New Beginning》的所有其他成就。
description.russian: Вы получили все остальные достижения Outcast - A New Beginning.
description.japanese: 『Outcast - A New Beginning』の実績をすべて入手した
description.polish: Zdobyto wszystkie inne osiągnięcia z Outcast - A New Beginning.
description.arabic: حصلت على جميع إنجازات Outcast - A New Beginning الأخرى.
description.brazilian: Você desbloqueou todas as conquistas de Outcast - A New Beginning.
